titles: A poem upon the imprisonment of Mr. Calamy in Newgate. By Robert Wild, D.D. author of the late Iter Boreale.
author: Wild, Robert, 1609-1679.
notes: Verse: "This Page I send to you Sir, your Newgate Fate ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
